YOU are apart of the problem, you are supporting a white supremacist which basically means you are a white supremacist and no I‚Äôm not taking anything out of ‚Äúcontext‚Äù because even with context it is still disgusting and horrible. Supporting him is supporting systematic racism and abuse in this country and under trumps administration he has broken the peace treaty between indigenous tribes and the put children in cages and many have died due to both of those injustices. On top of all that trump is homophobic and just recently passed a law that puts restrictions on same sex couples adopting so trump pretty much feels better with kids in the system than with a living same sex couple. Last but definitely not least trump supporters your only argument is that liberals and Democrats are just children who have zero stable points in their defense but in all actuality that‚Äôs trump supporters their only argument is trump 2020 if you have actually valid points I would live to hear them but I haven‚Äôt heard any truly well formulated arguments to why I should support trump so please educate me on why we should let a man who encourages systematic racism and sex abuse as well as homophobia to be in office for another 4 years. Thank you for reading why your president (because i will never see him as my president) is a pompous douche bag.
